mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pick_ware ( pickware_id,org_id,package_code, pickware_code, order_id,operate_type,operator,operate_time, can_receive,create_time, update_time, yn,fingerprint) VALUES ( SEQ_PICK_WARE.NEXTVAL,#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pickwareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pickwareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{canReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER},NOW(),NOW(), 1,#{fingerprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
